author: Brandon Reznik
comment: The hour hand is way too big and just looks goofy. Also the option to change the colors doesn't work for LG g-watch R. Can I please get a refund?

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I love this watch face and the colors are so much fun. Perhaps the second hand could have option to be sleeping or ticking every second. A date addition would be nice option as well.
title: Very unique!
